name: Darkvision
desc: You are able to see clearly up to 60ft in dim light, and in darkness up to 60ft as if it were dim light.

name: Celestial Resistance
desc: You have resistance to necrotic and radiant damage.

name: Healing Touch
desc: As an action, you can touch a creature and cause it to regain a number of HP equal to your level. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Light Bearer
desc: You know the cantrip Light. CHA is your spellcasting ability for it.

name: Radiant Soul (3rd LVL)
desc: As an action, you can unleash your divine power causing your eyes to glimmer and celestial wings to sprout from your back. Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, you have a flying speed of 30ft per round and once per turn you may deal extra radiant damage equal to your level when you damage a target with an attack or spell. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Powerful Build
desc: You count as one size larger when determining the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

name: Mountain Born
desc: You have resistance to cold damage.

name: Natural Athlete
desc: You have proficiency in the Athletics skill.

name: Stone’s Endurance
desc: You can focus yourself to shrug off an injury. When you take damage, you may roll a d12 and add your CON modifier to the number rolled, then reduce the damage by that number. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Fey Ancestry
desc: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed. In addition, magic can’t put you to sleep.

name: Versatile
desc: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

name: Elvish Knowledge
desc: ou know one cantrip of your choice from the Wizard list. INT is your spellcasting ability for it.

name: Menacing
desc: You have proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

name: Relentless Endurance
desc: If your HP would be reduced to 0 but you are not killed outright, you may instead have it be reduced to 1. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Savage Attack
desc: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you may roll one of the weapon’s damage dice one additional time and add that number to the damage of the critical hit.

name: Well Spoken
desc: You can speak, read and write one language of your choice.

name: Infernal Resistance
desc: You have resistance to fire damage.

name: Infernal Legacy
desc: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip. At 3rd LVL, you know the Infernal Rebuke spell. At 5th LVL, you know the Darkness spell. CHA is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Silver Tongue (3rd LVL)
desc: You know the Charm Person spell. CHA is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Charge
desc: You may charge straight at a target within 20ft and hit it with a melee weapon attack. If you do, you may roll your weapon’s damage twice and add those numbers together. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Hooves
desc: Your hooves are natural melee weapons with which you are proficient. If you hit with a hoof, your target takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage + your STR modifier.

name: Equine Build
desc: You count as one size larger when determining the weight you can push, drag, or lift. In addition, a Medium or smaller sized creature may ride on your equine back if you allow it.

name: Survivor
desc: You have proficiency in the Survival skill.

name: Hybrid Nature
desc: You count as both a Humanoid and a Monstrosity, and can be affected by any effect if it works on either of your creature types.

name: Claws
desc: Your claws are natural melee weapons with which you are proficient. If you hit with your claws, your target takes 1d6 slashing damage + your STR modifier.

name: Vulpine Grace
desc: You have proficiency in Acrobatics. In addition, you have advantage on saving throws to avoid falling prone.

name: Horns
desc: Your horns are natural melee weapons with which you are proficient. If you hit with your horns, your target takes 1d6 piercing damage + your STR modifier.

name: Hammering Horns
desc: After making a successful melee attack, you may attempt to push the target back 1d6 ft with your horns. Your target must be no more than one size larger than you and must be within 5ft. Your target must make a Strength saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your STR modifier. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after combat.

name: Feline Agility
desc: When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your movement speed until the end of your turn. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after combat.

name: Feline Claws
desc: Your claws are natural melee weapons with which you are proficient. If you hit with your claws, your target takes 1d6 slashing damage + your STR modifier. In addition, you have a climbing speed of 20ft per round.

name: Feline Senses
desc: You have proficiency in the Perception and Stealth skills.

name: Flight
desc: You have a flying speed of 50ft per round.

name: Talons
desc: Your talons are natural melee weapons with which you are proficient. If you hit with your talons, your target takes 1d6 slashing damage + your STR modifier.

name: Expert Forgery
desc: You have advantage on all checks made to produce forgeries or duplicates of existing objects.

name: Master of Trickery
desc: You have proficiency in the Deception and Sleight of Hand skills.

name: Mimicry
desc: You are able to mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds you make can tell they are imitations with a successful Insight check opposed by your Deception check.

name: Who You Callin’ Small?
desc: When you damage a creature with an attack or spell who is at least one size larger than yours, you may have that attack deal extra damage to that creature equal to your LVL. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Nimble Escape
desc: You can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

name: Martial Training
desc: You have proficiency with light armor and with two martial weapons of your choice.

name: Saving Face
desc: If you miss with an attack roll or fail an ability check or saving throw, you may gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies who can see you within 30ft with a maximum of +5. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Mountain Born
desc: You have resistance to cold damage.

name: Display of Strength
desc: You have proficiency in the Intimidation skill. In addition, you may use your STR modifier instead of your CHA modifier for Intimidation checks.

name: Scholarly
desc: You have proficiency in the Arcana and History skills.

name: Ancient Wellspring
desc: As an action, you are able to heal yourself to full health. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Grovel
desc: As an action, you may cower to distract nearby foes. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10ft that can see you. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after combat.

name: Pack Tactics
desc: You have advantage on attack rolls as long as an ally is within 10ft of you.

name: Sunlight Sensitivity
desc: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks in direct sunlight or bright light.

name: Draconic Ancestry
desc: You are distantly related to a particular kind of dragon. The type of dragon determines the damage and area of your breath weapon, and the type of resistance you gain.

name: Dragonbreath
desc: As an action, you may use your breath weapon to exhale destructive energy. All creatures in the area of effect must make a saving throw. The DC of this saving throw is 8 + your CON modifier + your proficiency bonus. A creature takes 2d6 damage on a failed save. At 6th LVL, this damage increases to 3d6. At 11th LVL, this damage increases to 4d6. At 16th LVL, this damage increases to 5d6. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after combat.

name: Tough Scales
desc: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your ancestry.

name: Deep Resilience
desc: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or paralyzed.

name: Deep Magic (3rd LVL)
desc: You know the Enlarge Self spell. At 5th LVL, you know the Invisibility spell. INT is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Dwarven Resilience
desc: You have proficiency with smith’s tools.

name: Stoneskin
desc: You have proficiency in the History skill.

name: Survivalist
desc: You have proficiency with battleaxes and handaxes.

name: Trance
desc: Instead of sleeping, you meditate for up to 4 hours. This gives you the same benefit as a full rest.

name: Dark Magic
desc: You know the Dancing Lights cantrip. At 3rd LVL, you know the Fey Fire spell. At 5th LVL, you know the Darkness spell. CHA is your spellcasting ability for this

name: Stone Camouflage
desc: You have advantage on Stealth checks when in caves or rocky terrain.

name: Gnome Cunning
desc: You have advantage on INT, WIS and CHA saving throws against magic

name: Firbolg Magic
desc: You know the Detect Magic and Disguise Self spells. WIS is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Hidden Step
desc: As a bonus action, you can magically turn invisible until your next turn or until you attack, make a damage roll, or force someone to make a saving throw. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Lucky
desc: If you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check or saving throw, you may reroll the die. If you do, you must use the new result, even if it is a 1.

name: Brave
desc: You have advantage on Intimidation saving throws against you.

name: Naturally Stealthy
desc: You have advantage on Stealth checks even when not obscured.

name: Keen Senses
desc: ou know one cantrip of your choice from the Wizard list. INT is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Master Tinker
desc: You have proficiency with tinker’s tools.

name: Master of Magics
desc: You know two cantrips of your choice from the Wizard list. INT is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Gnome Cunning
desc: You have advantage on INT, WIS and CHA saving throws against magic.

name: Natural Illusionist
desc: You know the Minor Illusion cantrip. INT is your spellcasting modifier for this.

name: Speak with Small Beasts
desc: You are able to understand and communicate with Small or smaller beasts.

name: Gift of the Sea
desc: You know the Fog Cloud spell. At 3rd LVL, you know the Gust of Wind spell. At 5th LVL, you know the Wall of Water spell. CHA is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Aquatic Affinity
desc: You are able to understand and communicate with aquatic beasts. In addition, you have a swimming speed of 30ft per round.

name: Master Artisan
desc: You have proficiency with smith’s tools.

name: Craftsman’s Knowledge
desc: You have proficiency in the History skill.

name: AND MY AXE!
desc: You have proficiency with battleaxes and handaxes.

name: Mask of the Wild
desc: You gain advantage on Stealth checks when hiding in foliage, rain, snow, mist and other natural phenomena.

name: Ethereal Glow
desc: You generate dim light in a 10ft radius.

name: Ethereal Body (3rd LVL)
desc: You know the Invisibility spell. At 5th LVL, you know the Mist Step spell. At 7th LVL, you know the Nondetection spell. INT is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Contemplative
desc: You have proficiency in the History and Persuasion skills.

name: Psionic Grip
desc: You have advantage when attempting to charm a creature.

name: Ethereal Jaunt
desc: As a bonus action, you may teleport up to 30ft away. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.
